_meta.description: Draw Steel Ancestries data for Mettle/Anvil development
_meta.usage: LLM-optimized format. Contains signature traits, purchased traits with costs, and ancestry points.

ancestries.name: Devil
ancestries.description: The native ancestry of the Seven Cities of Hell, devils are humanoids with red or blue skin expressed in a wide variety of hues, from bright crimson to deep purple. Each devil is born with some hellmarkâ€”horns, a tail, cloven hooves, a forked tongue, fanged incisors, or even wings.

signatureTrait.name: Silver Tongue
signatureTrait.description: Your innate magic allows you to twist how your words are perceived to get a better read on people and convince them to see things your way. You have one skill of your choice from the interpersonal skill group, and you gain an edge on tests when attempting to discover an NPC's motivations and pitfalls during a negotiation.

purchasedTraits.name: Barbed Tail
purchasedTraits.description: Your pointy tail allows you to punctuate all your actions. Once per round when you make a melee strike, you can deal extra damage with the strike equal to your highest characteristic score.

purchasedTraits.name: Beast Legs
purchasedTraits.description: Your powerful legs make you faster. You have speed 6.

purchasedTraits.name: Glowing Eyes
purchasedTraits.description: Your eyes are a solid, vibrant color that flares to show your excitement or rage. Whenever you take damage from a creature, you can use a triggered action to curse that creature for daring to do you harm. The creature takes 1d10 psychic damage.

purchasedTraits.name: Hellsight
purchasedTraits.description: Your eyes let you see through the dark, fog, and other types of concealment. You don't take a bane on attacks against concealed, unhidden creatures.

purchasedTraits.name: Impressive Horns
purchasedTraits.description: Your cherished horns are a hardened representation of your force of will, granting you an edge on Presence resistance rolls.

purchasedTraits.name: Prehensile Tail
purchasedTraits.description: Your prehensile tail allows you to challenge foes on all sides. You can't be flanked.

purchasedTraits.name: Wings
purchasedTraits.description: You possess wings powerful enough to take you airborne. As a maneuver, you can switch between walking and flying when you are touching the ground, or vice versa when you are within 1 square of the ground. While flying, your stability drops to 0 and you have damage weakness 5. While using your wings to fly, you can stay aloft for a number of rounds equal to your Might (minimum of 1 round) before you fall prone.

ancestries.name: Dwarf
ancestries.description: Possessed of a strength that belies their size, dwarves have flesh infused with stoneâ€”a silico-organic hybrid making them physically denser than other humanoids. They enjoy a reputation in Orden as savvy engineers and technologists thanks to the lore they inherited from their elder siblings, the long-extinct steel dwarves.

signatureTrait.name: Runic Carving
signatureTrait.description: You can carve a rune onto your skin with 10 uninterrupted minutes of work, which is activated by the magic within your body. The rune you carve determines the benefit you receive: Detection (pick a creature/object type, rune glows within 20 squares), Light (skin sheds light for 10 squares), or Voice (telepathic communication with a willing creature within 1 mile).

purchasedTraits.name: Grounded
purchasedTraits.description: Your hearty constitution prevents you from losing strength. You can't be made weakened.

purchasedTraits.name: Immovable
purchasedTraits.description: Your heavy stone body and connection to the earth make it difficult for others to move you. You have a +1 bonus to stability.

purchasedTraits.name: Spark Off Your Skin
purchasedTraits.description: Your stone skin affords you potent protection. You have a +6 bonus to Stamina, and that bonus increases by 6 at 4th, 7th, and 10th levels.

purchasedTraits.name: Stand Like Stone
purchasedTraits.description: Your body is made to withstand the blows of your enemies. Your Might score is treated as 1 higher for the purpose of resisting potencies, and you gain an edge on Might tests when called for to resist environmental effects or a creature's traits or abilities.

purchasedTraits.name: Stone Singer
purchasedTraits.description: You have a magic connection to the earth. When you spend 1 uninterrupted hour singing, you can reshape any unworked mundane stone within 3 squares.

ancestries.name: Time Raider
ancestries.description: The original servitor species of the synliroiâ€”evil psions with near godlike powerâ€”the kuran'zoi liberated themselves during the First Psychic War. In the centuries since, they built their own culture and civilization as nomads of the timescape. The exonym 'time raiders' was given to them by denizens of the lower worlds who, seeing the advanced technology the kuran'zoi wield, concluded they must be from the future.

signatureTrait.name: Psychic Scar
signatureTrait.description: Your mind is a formidable layer of defense. You have psychic immunity equal to your level.

purchasedTraits.name: Beyondsight
purchasedTraits.description: As a maneuver, you can adjust your vision to allow you to see through mundane obstructions that are 1 square thick or less. While your vision is adjusted this way, you can't see the area within 1 square of you and you don't have line of effect to any creature or object in that area. You can restore your usual vision as a maneuver.

purchasedTraits.name: Foresight
purchasedTraits.description: Your senses extend past mundane obscuration and the veil of the future alike. You automatically know the location of any creature with concealment who isn't hidden from you within 20, and you negate the usual bane on strikes against such creatures. Additionally, whenever you are targeted by a strike, you can use a triggered action to impose a bane on the power roll.

purchasedTraits.name: Four-Armed Athletics
purchasedTraits.description: Your unique physiology enhances your movement. You gain an edge on tests that use the Climb, Gymnastics, or Swim skills when you can use all your arms in the attempt.

purchasedTraits.name: Four-Armed Martial Arts
purchasedTraits.description: Your multiple arms let you take on multiple tasks at the same time. Whenever you use the Grab or Knockback maneuver against an adjacent creature, you can target one additional adjacent creature, using the same power roll for both targets. Additionally, you can have up to two creatures grabbed at a time.

purchasedTraits.name: Psionic Gift
purchasedTraits.description: Choose one signature ability from the following options: Concussive Slam, Psionic Bolt, or Minor Acceleration. Signature abilities can be used at will.

purchasedTraits.name: Unstoppable Mind
purchasedTraits.description: Your mind allows you to maintain your focus in any situation. You can't be made dazed.

ancestries.name: Revenant
ancestries.description: No hero starts their life as a revenant. Rather, these undead creatures return to the world of the living because they have dire business that must be finished. A character of any ancestry can become a revenant.
ancestries.ancestryPointsNote: 3 ancestry points if your size is 1S

signatureTrait.name: Former Life
signatureTrait.description: Choose the ancestry you were before you died. Your size is that ancestry's size and your speed is 5. Unless you select one of the Previous Life traits, you don't receive any other ancestral traits from your original ancestry. Your undead body grants you immunity to cold, corruption, lightning, and poison damage equal to your level, but you have fire weakness 5. You can't suffocate, and you don't need to eat or drink to stay alive. When your Stamina reaches the negative of your winded value, you become inert instead of dying.

purchasedTraits.name: Bloodless
purchasedTraits.description: For you, an open wound is indistinguishable from a scratch. You can't be made bleeding even while dying.

purchasedTraits.name: Previous Life (1 Point)
purchasedTraits.description: You select a purchased trait that costs 1 ancestry point from your previous ancestry. You can take this trait multiple times, selecting a different 1 point trait from your previous ancestry each time.

purchasedTraits.name: Previous Life (2 Points)
purchasedTraits.description: You select a purchased trait that costs 2 ancestry points from your previous ancestry.

purchasedTraits.name: Undead Influence
purchasedTraits.description: Your supernatural gifts allow you to influence other undead. You gain an edge on Reason, Intuition, and Presence tests made to interact with undead creatures.

purchasedTraits.name: Vengeance Mark
purchasedTraits.description: As a maneuver, you place a magic sigil on a creature within 10 squares. When you place a sigil, you decide where it appears on the creature's body, and whether the sigil is visible to only you or to all creatures.

ancestries.name: Dragon Knight
ancestries.description: Dragon knights are muscled draconic humanoids who stand between 6 and 7 feet tall. The scales covering their reptilian heads, bodies, and tails can be almost any color. All dragon knights have wings, but on only a few are those wings big enough to let them fly.

signatureTrait.name: Wyrmplate
signatureTrait.description: Your hardened scales grant you damage immunity equal to your level to one of the following damage types: acid, cold, corruption, fire, lightning, or poison. You can change your damage immunity type when you finish a respite.

purchasedTraits.name: Draconian Guard
purchasedTraits.description: Whenever you or an adjacent creature takes damage from a strike, you can use a triggered action to guard against the blow. You reduce any damage from the strike by an amount equal to your level.

purchasedTraits.name: Draconian Pride
purchasedTraits.description: You have the Draconian Pride signature ability. You let loose a mighty roar to shake your foes' spirits. Area, Magic. 1 burst targeting each enemy in the area. Power Roll + Might or Presence: ≤11: 2 damage; 12-16: 5 damage, push 1; 17+: 7 damage, push 2.

purchasedTraits.name: Dragon Breath
purchasedTraits.description: You have the Dragon Breath signature ability. A furious exhalation of energy washes over your foes. Area, Magic. 3 cube within 1 targeting each enemy in the area. Power Roll + Might or Presence: ≤11: 2 damage; 12-16: 4 damage; 17+: 6 damage. You choose the damage type from acid, cold, corruption, fire, lightning, or poison.

purchasedTraits.name: Prismatic Scales
purchasedTraits.description: Select one damage immunity granted by your Wyrmplate trait. You always have this immunity, in addition to the immunity granted by Wyrmplate.

purchasedTraits.name: Remember Your Oath
purchasedTraits.description: As a maneuver, you can recite your oath. Until the start of your next turn, whenever you make a saving throw, you succeed on a 4 or higher.

purchasedTraits.name: Wings
purchasedTraits.description: You possess wings powerful enough to take you airborne. While using your wings to fly, you can stay aloft for a number of rounds equal to your Might score (minimum 1 round) before you fall. While using your wings to fly at 3rd level or lower, you have damage weakness 5.

ancestries.name: Wode Elf
ancestries.description: Children of the sylvan celestials and masters of the elf-haunted forests called wodes, wode elves see all forests as their domain by birthright. Their natural ability to mask their presence, called glamor, complements their guerilla style of fighting.

signatureTrait.name: Wode Elf Glamor
signatureTrait.description: You can magically alter your appearance to better blend in with your surroundings. You gain an edge on tests made to hide and sneak, and tests made to search for you while you are hidden take a bane.

purchasedTraits.name: Forest Walk
purchasedTraits.description: You can shift into and while within difficult terrain.

purchasedTraits.name: Quick and Brutal
purchasedTraits.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, you can take an additional main action and an additional move action instead of just a main action.

purchasedTraits.name: Otherworldly Grace
purchasedTraits.description: Your elf body and mind can't be contained for long. Whenever you make a saving throw, you succeed on a roll of 5 or higher.

purchasedTraits.name: Revisit Memory
purchasedTraits.description: Accessing memories is as easy as living in the present for you. You gain an edge on tests made to recall lore.

purchasedTraits.name: Swift
purchasedTraits.description: You have speed 6.

purchasedTraits.name: The Wode Defends
purchasedTraits.description: You have The Wode Defends signature ability. Thorny vines erupt from every surface and attempt to bind your foe. Magic, Ranged, Strike. Ranged 10 targeting one creature. Power Roll + Might or Agility: ≤11: 2 + M or A damage, slowed (save ends) vs weak Agility; 12-16: 3 + M or A damage, slowed (save ends) vs average Agility; 17+: 5 + M or A damage, restrained (save ends) vs strong Agility.

ancestries.name: High Elf
ancestries.description: Children of the solar celestials created to tend their libraries and attend to the true elves as heralds, high elf history describes a better age, before the coming of humans and war. A time when the celestials were still in the world, and all that mattered was art and beauty.

signatureTrait.name: High Elf Glamor
signatureTrait.description: A magic glamor makes others perceive you as interesting and engaging, granting you an edge on Presence tests using the Flirt or Persuade skills. This glamor makes you appear and sound slightly different to each creature you meet, since what is engaging to one might be different for another. However, you never appear to be anyone other than yourself.

purchasedTraits.name: Glamor of Terror
purchasedTraits.description: When a foe strikes, you reverse the magic of your glamor to instill fear into their heart. Whenever you take damage from a creature, you can use a triggered action to make that creature frightened of you until the end of their next turn.

purchasedTraits.name: Graceful Retreat
purchasedTraits.description: You gain a +1 bonus to the distance you can shift when you take the Disengage move action.

purchasedTraits.name: High Senses
purchasedTraits.description: Your senses are especially keen and perceptive. You gain an edge on tests made to notice threats.

purchasedTraits.name: Otherworldly Grace
purchasedTraits.description: Your elf body and mind can't be contained for long. Whenever you make a saving throw, you succeed on a roll of 5 or higher.

purchasedTraits.name: Revisit Memory
purchasedTraits.description: Accessing memories is as easy as living in the present for you. You gain an edge on tests made to recall lore.

purchasedTraits.name: Unstoppable Mind
purchasedTraits.description: Your mind allows you to maintain your focus in any situation. You can't be made dazed.

ancestries.name: Human
ancestries.description: Humans are the most numerous people in Orden. They belong to the world in a way the other speaking peoples do not—they can sense the presence of the supernatural, and magic's grip on them is light.

signatureTrait.name: Detect the Supernatural
signatureTrait.description: As a maneuver, you can open your awareness to detect supernatural creatures and phenomena. Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of any supernatural object, or any undead, construct, or creature from another world within 5 squares, even if you don't have line of effect to that object or creature. You know if you're detecting an item or a creature, and you know the nature of any creature you detect.

purchasedTraits.name: Can't Take Hold
purchasedTraits.description: Your connection to the natural world allows you to resist certain supernatural effects. You ignore temporary difficult terrain created by magic and psionic abilities. Additionally, when you are force moved by a magic or psionic ability, you can reduce the forced movement distance by 1.

purchasedTraits.name: Determination
purchasedTraits.description: A tolerance for pain and distress allows you to push through difficult situations. If you are frightened, slowed, or weakened, you can use a maneuver to immediately end one of those conditions.

purchasedTraits.name: Perseverance
purchasedTraits.description: Giving up is for other people. You gain an edge on tests made using the Endurance skill. Additionally, when you are slowed, your speed is reduced to 3 instead of 2.

purchasedTraits.name: Resist the Unnatural
purchasedTraits.description: Your instinctive resilience protects you from injuries beyond the routine. Whenever you take damage that isn't untyped, you can use a triggered action to take half the damage.

purchasedTraits.name: Staying Power
purchasedTraits.description: Your human physiology allows you to fight, run, and stay awake longer than others. You increase your number of Recoveries by 2.

ancestries.name: Orc
ancestries.description: Orcs have skin in green tones and stand slightly taller and wider than humans. A supernatural energy they call 'the blood fire' flows through their veins, igniting colorful lines in an orc's skin during life-or-death battles.

signatureTrait.name: Relentless
signatureTrait.description: Whenever a creature deals damage to you that leaves you dying, you can make a free strike against any creature. If the creature is reduced to 0 Stamina by your strike, you can spend a Recovery.

purchasedTraits.name: Bloodfire Rush
purchasedTraits.description: The magic coursing through your veins makes you run faster in the heat of battle. The first time in any combat round that you take damage, you gain a +2 bonus to speed until the end of the round.

purchasedTraits.name: Glowing Recovery
purchasedTraits.description: Your bloodfire allows you to regain your strength quicker than others. Whenever you use the Catch Breath maneuver, you can spend as many Recoveries as you like.

purchasedTraits.name: Grounded
purchasedTraits.description: The magic in your blood makes it difficult for others to move you. You have a +1 bonus to stability.

purchasedTraits.name: Nonstop
purchasedTraits.description: Your bloodfire supplies you with a constant rush of adrenaline. You can't be made slowed.

purchasedTraits.name: Passionate Artisan
purchasedTraits.description: When you are stirred by a passion for creation, your bloodfire allows you to work longer and harder. When you gain your initial skills from your career, culture, class, or other source, choose two skills from the crafting skill group, whether you have those skills or not. Whenever you make a project roll for a crafting project that uses these skills, you gain a +2 bonus to the roll.

ancestries.name: Polder
ancestries.description: Short, averaging 3½ feet tall, the polders' origins are obscure. They are a young species who, like humans, have no single patron god. Their ability to shadowmeld means they enjoy a reputation as excellent spies and thieves—though polders are also famed as chefs.

signatureTrait.name: Shadowmeld & Small!
signatureTrait.description: Your size is 1S. You have the Shadowmeld ability: As a main action, you flatten yourself into a shadow against a wall or floor you are touching, and become hidden from any creature you have cover or concealment from or who isn't observing you. While in shadow form, strikes against you and tests to search for you take a bane. You can't move or take main actions except to exit this form. You can exit as a maneuver.

purchasedTraits.name: Corruption Immunity
purchasedTraits.description: Your innate shadow magic grants you resilience against the unnatural. You have corruption immunity equal to your level + 2.

purchasedTraits.name: Fearless
purchasedTraits.description: Courage is all you know. You can't be made frightened.

purchasedTraits.name: Graceful Retreat
purchasedTraits.description: Your small size makes it easier for you to slip away from the fray. You gain a +1 bonus to the distance you can shift when you take the Disengage move action.

purchasedTraits.name: Nimblestep
purchasedTraits.description: A light step serves you well when speed is of the essence. You ignore the effects of difficult terrain and can move at full speed while sneaking.

purchasedTraits.name: Polder Geist
purchasedTraits.description: Evading others' notice gives you freedom to move. At the start of each of your turns during combat, if no enemy has line of effect to you or if you are hidden from or have concealment from any enemy with line of effect to you, you gain a +3 bonus to speed until the end of your turn.

purchasedTraits.name: Reactive Tumble
purchasedTraits.description: Staying light on your feet lets you quickly get back into position. Whenever you are force moved, you can use a free triggered action to shift 1 square after the forced movement is resolved.

ancestries.name: Hakaan
ancestries.description: Descended from a tribe of giants in upper Vanigar, the original Haka'an tribe made a bargain with Holkatya the Vanigar trickster god. They traded some of their gigantic size and strength for the ability to see the future—but Holkatya betrayed them.

signatureTrait.name: Big!
signatureTrait.description: Your stature reflects your giant forebears. Your size is 1L.

purchasedTraits.name: All Is a Feather
purchasedTraits.description: You are exceptionally strong. You gain an edge on tests made to lift and haul heavy objects.

purchasedTraits.name: Doomsight
purchasedTraits.description: Working with your Director, you can predetermine an encounter in which you will die. When that encounter begins, you become doomed. While doomed, you automatically obtain a tier 3 outcome on tests and ability rolls, and you don't die no matter how low your Stamina falls. You then die immediately at the end of the encounter. Additionally, when your Stamina reaches the negative of your winded value and you are not doomed, you turn to rubble instead of dying. After 12 hours, you regain Stamina equal to your recovery value.

purchasedTraits.name: Forceful
purchasedTraits.description: Whenever you force move a creature or object, the forced movement distance gains a +1 bonus.

purchasedTraits.name: Great Fortitude
purchasedTraits.description: Your hearty constitution prevents you from losing strength. You can't be made weakened.

purchasedTraits.name: Stand Tough
purchasedTraits.description: Your body is made to withstand the blows of your enemies. Your Might score is treated as 1 higher for the purpose of resisting potencies, and you gain an edge on Might tests when called for to resist environmental effects or a creature's traits or abilities.

ancestries.name: Memonek
ancestries.description: The native denizens of Axiom, the Plane of Uttermost Law. Their minds are highly ordered; reason is their great pride. But when descending to the lower planes, a sickness comes over them—an uncontrollable sensation called emotion.

signatureTrait.name: Fall Lightly & Lightweight
signatureTrait.description: Your silicone body is low in density. Whenever you fall, you reduce the distance of the fall by 2 squares. Additionally, whenever another creature attempts to force move you, you treat your size as one size smaller than it is.

purchasedTraits.name: I Am Law
purchasedTraits.description: Your lawful nature and quick reflexes mean you give no quarter to creatures trying to get past you. Enemies can't move through your space unless you allow them to do so.

purchasedTraits.name: Keeper of Order
purchasedTraits.description: Your connection to Axiom, the plane of Uttermost Law, allows you to manage chaos around you. Once per round when you or an adjacent creature makes a power roll, you can use a free triggered action to remove an edge or a bane on the roll, to turn a double edge into an edge, or to turn a double bane into a bane.

purchasedTraits.name: Lightning Nimbleness
purchasedTraits.description: You can push your body to move at incredible speeds. Your speed is 7.

purchasedTraits.name: Nonstop
purchasedTraits.description: Your connection to Axiom allows you to regulate your movement. You can't be made slowed.

purchasedTraits.name: Systematic Mind
purchasedTraits.description: You gain an edge on tests made to parse schematics, maps, and other systematic documents that aren't inherently chaotic. In addition, you treat any language you don't know as if you know a related language.

purchasedTraits.name: Unphased
purchasedTraits.description: Your ordered mind can't be caught off guard. You can't be made surprised.

purchasedTraits.name: Useful Emotion
purchasedTraits.description: Velloparatha—the worldsickness—might hinder you, but you know how to turn your pain into something your enemies feel. At the start of any combat, you gain 1 surge.
